column5: this was at cooks bay lake simcoe.  One female rushed to hospital life threatening injuries.  http://www.680news.com/2015/06/21/5-injure...rn-lake-simcoe/  this is exactly what i'm saying folks...  BOATING SAFETY FIRST - BE AWARE OF YOUR SURROUNDINGS
You need eyes on the back of your head these days. Sheesh.  Play safe folks!  S.

I see so many near misses every year living on the kawarthas as well as fishing them it's unreal what I have seen ......and boats are bigger & faster than ever !!! We have way too many offshore 100mph boats on the kawarthas there will be a big bad accident sooner or later     Glad there was no fatalities on simcoe !!!!
Unreal wonder how that transpired, glad everyone's doing ok & the most hurt is recovering
